snippet: Mr.Barshop, with his brother, used $45,000 in borrowed money to begin the La Quinta Inns & Suites hotel chain.
abstract: Sam Barshop, who with his brother used $45,000 in borrowed money to begin the La Quinta Inns & Suites hotel chain, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Mr.Barshop, with his brother, used $45,000 in borrowed money to begin the La Quinta Inns & Suites hotel chain.

headline.main: Sam Barshop, Hotels’ Founder, Dies at 84
